media_type.name: Opsgenie
media_type.description:
Please refer to https://docs.opsgenie.com/docs/alert-api and https://www.zabbix.com/documentation/5.0/manual/config/notifications/media/webhook#example_scripts.
Set global macro {$ZABBIX.URL} with your Zabbix server URL. Add dedicated user with media type "Opsgenie". Change the values of the variables opsgenie_api (https://api.opsgenie.com/v2/alerts or https://api.eu.opsgenie.com/v2/alerts), opsgenie_web (for example, https://myzabbix.app.opsgenie.com), opsgenie_token.
